title: [流量党＆灌水]遥远的六级啊
author: xiaoDH
txt_content: 看着金星升了六级，一点也不开心，我自己还差100多分，六级，好遥远  ＠金星登陆者

replies.author: xiaoDH
replies.txt_content: 各位农夫们，向六级奋斗吧！

replies.author: yangwenjun6370
replies.txt_content: 佩服，佩服，佩服，真是机智

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content: 金星早就6级了，我还差不到100分7级2333

replies.author: omgmc1
replies.txt_content: 加油。不过为什么要到6级？

replies.author: mgzic
replies.txt_content: 我还差不到一千  也就900多八级

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content: 我要升级还有七千多分

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 发些有意义的帖子，6级很快的

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
什么6级？




--------“即使世界背叛你，我也会在你身边。”

replies.author: aszxaz200
replies.txt_content: 多水水，多看看，多发帖，6级妥妥的到手

replies.author: xiaoDH
replies.txt_content:
Because. 发表于 2016-11-24 19:52 什么6级？ 
我觉得…你这回复更水…
